glosses: To aspire to be like somebody one admires; to emulate something or someone.
To show utmost attention while doing something; to take pains.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish اوزنمك (üzenmek, “to take pains, to be pains-taking”), from Ottoman Turkish اوز (öz, “pith, essence, the self”), from Proto-Turkic *ȫŕ (“inside, the essential part, the self”).
